channel.title: Utm on Sriram S - Innervoice
channel.description: Recent content in Utm on Sriram S - Innervoice

item.title: HTML5 Local Storage based preferences for the URL Generator project
item.description: The release 2 (R2) of my URL Generator Project is now ready. You can check it out at the usual location. I am happy to share that this revision was completed on time as per my revised project plan. Of course the announcement was delayed a bit. The main additions to this version of the URL generator are HTML5 based Local Storage, a simple usage of Object-oriented JavaScript techniques and jQuery.

item.title: Changes to my URL Generator Project Milestones
item.description: Today I want to announce some changes in the milestones and roadmap of my URL Generator Project.

item.title: 4 Important CSS Concepts I learnt
item.description: As part of Release 1.0 of my URL Generator project, I learnt several important CSS concepts. Here is a summary of four of those concepts.
